English: <color=red>://ERROR: Door in emergency lockdown. Door can be unlocked from <color=orange>ZONE 147</color>.</color>
Description:
Don't localize ZONE 147.
A text string that appears on screen when the player attempts to open a door which is locked due to an emergency lockdown. Don't alter the RichText tags.

French.Translation: <color=red>://ERREUR : Verrouillage d'urgence activé. La porte peut être déverrouillée depuis la <color=orange>ZONE 147</color>.</color>

Italian.Translation: <color=red>://ERRORE: porta in blocco d'emergenza. Può essere sbloccata dalla <color=orange>ZONE 147</color>.</color>

German.Translation: <color=red>://FEHLER: Tür in Notverriegelung. Die Tür kann von <color=orange>ZONE 147</color> aus entriegelt werden.</color>

Spanish.Translation: <color=red>://ERROR: Puerta en cierre de emergencia. La puerta se puede desbloquear desde la <color=orange>ZONE 147</color>.</color>

Russian.Translation: <color=red>://ОШИБКА. Действует режим изоляции. Для разблокировки отправляйтесь в <color=orange>ZONE 147</color>.</color>

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: <color=red>://ERRO: Porta em confinamento de emergência. A porta pode ser destrancada na <color=orange>ZONE 147</color>.</color>

Polish.Translation: <color=red>://BŁĄD: Blokada awaryjna drzwi. Drzwi można odblokować w <color=orange>strefie 147 [ZONE_147]</color>.</color>

Japanese.Translation: <color=red>://エラー：ドアは緊急封鎖中。 <color=orange>ZONE 147</color> で封鎖解除可能。</color>

Korean.Translation: <color=red>://오류: 문이 비상 폐쇄 상태입니다. <color=orange>ZONE 147에서 문을 개방할 수 있습니다</color>.</color>

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: <color=red>://錯誤：門處於緊急封鎖狀態。可以從<color=orange>ZONE 147</color>解鎖門。</color>

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: <color=red>://错误：门处于紧急封锁中。可从<color=orange>ZONE 147</color>解锁。</color>

name: LevelLayoutData.ProgressionPuzzle.CustomText_C1_2
